====Usage notes====
Extremely rare.  When written in kanji, more commonly spelled using the character {{l|ja|弗}}.  The full Japanese term for {{m|en|fluorine}} is {{ja-l|弗素}}, much more commonly written in Japanese in [[katakana]], as {{ja-l|フッ素}}.
